page.title: 08ECOLOGY (Contd.)
page.content: {Flora & fauna:}There are many types of deciduous trees,a wide variety of wild flowers including snowdrop,primrose,spotted orchid,white bellflower ({RARE}) and cotton grass (found on Spaghnum moss). Badgers have been sighted;wild mink are on the increase.Also known to inhabit this area are red squirrels, pygmy shrews and roe deer. In the new forestry plantations, a variety of predatory birds have been sighted:_short-eared owls,hen harriers,sparrowhawks and kestrels feed on numerous small animals. Recently a whimbrel has been sighted. In the Irthing Gorge and wood especially,many different types of birds can be seen.
